Key Arguments: The government should not determine what constitutes misinformation or disinformation.
The bill could lead to government control over citizens, similar to totalitarian regimes.
The legislation could stifle free discussion and opposing views.
The bill exempts the government from punitive action, indicating potential misuse of power.
Notable Quotes: This bill (if passed) will result in an Orwellian style control of the Government/Bureaucracy over its citizens.
Something that has only ever happened in totalitarian regimes such as the Nazi Party, some Communist and some religion based regimes in the middle east.
Finally, I note that the bill expressly exempts the Government and its bureaucracy from punitive action should the bill become law.
